form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: United States Court House Buffalo, New York 14202, A19 360 870 ( (TC)

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/11/2023 United States Court House A19 360 870 (TC) Buffalo, New York 14202 July 13, 1972 Mr. Chet Mehta 65 Salem Road Rochester, New York 14622 Dear Mr. Mehta: Reference is made to the contents of your letter received in April to this office relating to your mother, Savitri Devi Mehta. Inasmuch as nonpreference visa numbers are currently available to natives of the Eastern Hemisphere, your mother may apply for status as a permanent resident at this time. The application would be premised, of course, on the grounds that she would not be gainfully employed and would be fully supported either by her own resources or by you. If your mother wishes to file such an applica- tion, the enclosed Form I-485 and relating forms should be executed in accordance with the instruc- tions and submitted to this office with the required fee and documents. Very truly yours, James P. Korn Acting Assistant District Director Travel Control Encs. JPK:lfa
